idea: Moving to a new city as a student is a daunting task. India has a broad number of students that relocate from their home towns in order to achieve their dreams. ApnaBox helps relieve some of the challenges through our customizable and essential student boxes. We include 60 items in our box which are required for their day to day student life. The box reaches the new residence along with the student thus providing convenience as well. Moreover, our box is much more affordable when compared to buying the variety of products through other retailers and online marketplaces.
name: ApnaBox

idea: INVOGLOBE TECHNOLOGIES (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITEDINVOGLOBE TECHNOLOGIES (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITEDINVOGLOBE TECHNOLOGIES (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITEDINVOGLOBE TECHNOLOGIES (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED
name: INVOGLOBE TECHNOLOGIES (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Despite tremendous leaps and bounds in the medical field globally, the benefits to society have been highly skewed. While few countries prospered, many still depend on outdated medical devices and obsolete technology. Access to highly skilled medical talent, non-availability of healthcare infrastructure, long wait-time and soaring costs continue to remain a concern for many countries.

 Travelling abroad for a medical treatment is hustle. Its a new region, one is not aware of best hospitals, top doctors, treatment protocols, taking appointments and that too via 1000s km away and in different timezone. Not considering countless efforts goes behind arranging visa, finding temporary stay, travel, getting local sim card, arranging food, consultation and treatment in India. It is exhaustive and emotionally draining. We felt we can help here and pre organise everything for the patient. That way, they can focus only on getting surgery or treatment, get well and go back safe and sound, without too much planning and execution. Great part is getting a package comes out to be 20-25% cheaper than doing on your own minus all the efforts you would have invested planning.
name: REMEDE HEALTH AND WELLNESS SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED
